Welcome to my personal website!

I am a Ph.D. candidate in the [Department of Economics](https://www.albany.edu/economics){target="_blank"} at [University at Albany, SUNY](https://www.albany.edu/){target="_blank"}. My main research fields are **Monetary Economics** and **International Economics**. My current research focuses on the transition of monetary policy in China. 

I am on the 2021-2022 job market and available for interviews.
